summary: Task marketplace platform with worker profiles, earnings tracking, and 7% fee system
architectural_notes: Worker profile displays: name, rating, total tasks, location (5km radius), skills, hourly/task rates
Earnings system: 7% platform fee, total earnings and daily earnings tracking
Task history shows recent completed/pending tasks with timestamps and earnings
Auto-calculated rating based on completed tasks
Profile edit functionality and stats analytics dashboard
Admin can view all user profiles; users see their own profile
